alert.note: Alert for Amador; El Dorado; Sacramento (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 2:40PM PST until January 15 at 1:40PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Cosumnes River At Michigan Bar affecting El Dorado, Amador and Sacramento Counties. .Heavy rainfall is producing a significant rise on the Cosumnes River. The Cosumnes River at Michigan Bar is expected to rise above flood stage this evening. For the Cosumnes River...including Michigan Bar, McConnell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cosumnes River at Michigan Bar. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water flows on to the road near Wilton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM PST Saturday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 12.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. For more hydrologic information and stage definitions refer to the following web site: wrh.noaa.gov/sto/hydro_data.php The next statement will be issued late tonight at 245 AM PST.
